channel.title: Statuses on Managed Services Status - Mad Scientist Technologies
channel.description: Recent content in Statuses on Managed Services Status - Mad Scientist Technologies

item.title: Data Center Maintenance Window for 2024-04-16
item.description: Maintenance Window: Start: 2024-04-16 11:00 UTC / April 16 - 6:00 AM CDT End: 2024-04-16 13:00 UTC / April 16 - 8:00 AM CDT During the above Maintenance Window our Data Center Provider will be performing core network improvements in our primary data center locations. There is no expected downtime or outage during this window. However, there may be an increase latency or a minor disruption in network traffic for 2-3 minutes.

item.title: Previous Events
item.description: Due to changing platforms for this service, and our goal maintaining old URLs for archived purposes, our older entries can be found: https://status.madscitech.net/post/. All entries between January 2016 - March 2024 can be found at the above link.
